hymn.title: Honor, honor
hymn.category: Principles on How to Be a Proper Human Being—Honor
hymn.chords: | Am - - - | E7 - Am - | Am - - - | E7 - Am - | Am - - - | Am - - - | Am - - - | Am - - - | Dm - Am/C - | Dm/B E7 Am - | Dm - Am/C - | Dm/B E7 Am - |

layout.singingstanza: Hon -- or, hon -- or, hon -- or, hon -- or, Hon -- or, hon -- or, hon -- or! Hon -- or, hon -- or, hon -- or, hon -- or, Hon -- or, hon -- or, hon -- or! Hon -- or God, hon -- or God! Hon -- or all men al -- so. Hon -- or God, hon -- or God! Hon -- or all men al -- so. Do un -- to oth -- ers as you would have them do un -- to you. Do un -- to oth -- ers as you would have them do un -- to you.
layout.sheetcopyright: www.hymnal.net; © 2008 Bible StorySongs, Inc. Used by permission.

lyrics.stanza: Honor, honor, honor, honor, Honor, honor, honor! Honor, honor, honor, honor, Honor, honor, honor!
Honor God, honor God! Honor all men also. Honor God, honor God! Honor all men also.
Do unto others as you would have them do unto you. Do unto others as you would have them do unto you.
